title: Why does the patch ignore the jungle?
body: Jungling is horrible right now, what gives?

replies.body:
I see Vi mentioned a lot as this overpowered monster in the jungle, but is she really that strong?  Or is it just that she's one of the few capable junglers that can survive this hellish mistake of a new jungle where others can't?

I would put J4 in the same boat as her if it did a little less damage for the utility he brings, and Lee is...well...bullshit and has been for multiple years.

She jungles more or less the same as she did last season, and the double brutalizer (one on jungle item) build is vi-ry good on her. She also has the trappings of a generally good soloq champion (scales decently, can pick people, her ult is a big "IM INITIATING THE TEAMFIGHT" flag, can control earlygame, has an easy time with dragon).

Source: was 15W0L on her this season.
i rather face a lee sin or j4 instead of a vi in the jungle she is a nightmere

> [{quoted}](name=Chespin2013,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2eoidEuA,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-12T01:05:18.412+0000)
>
> i rather face a lee sin or j4 instead of a vi in the jungle she is a nightmere

You need to call a doctor right away.
not j4 that guy just so gey
jungle is fucked up right now. no buffs for the champs that arent doing well in the jg??? nerf to fiddle who no one thought was op??? well played riot well played

Well, considering it's Fearless who "reworked" the jungle, you shouldn't be surprised that he came in, ruined everything and then abandoned it completely.  That's the exact same stunt he pulled with Sona.  It's the same stunt he's gonna pull on the next project he touches.  He makes changes based solely on his own personal desires, completely disregarding game health.  Then when he's had his fun, he gets bored and moves on.  He probably has a short attention span.

They said they were working on it and it wasn't going to be touched in 5.3. They projected 5.4 or 5.5 they would look at going back and hitting it again. The specifically mentioned poacher's but nothing really else has been said as they want to overhaul shit yet again.
what makes you think a role that has the most influence in the game is horrible?
